effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate a Winning Streak! increasing the damage of your Death Coil and Epidemic by 4.5%, stacking up to 10 times. Death Coil and Epidemic have a 15% chance to remove Winning Streak!

Set: Casting Dark Transformation grants up to 10 stacks of Winning Streak! and while Dark Transformation is active, the effectiveness of Winning Streak! is increased by 100% and it no longer has a chance to reset.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Deal yourself in, granting you 7,957 to 9,725 Mastery for 15 sec and stacking the deck. Stacking the deck increases the minimum Mastery on future hands by 295 until you leave combat, up to 3 times. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

name: Suspicious Energy Drink

spells.description: Equip: When you use harmful spells or abilities, there is a chance you also take a sip of the energy drink, increasing your Mastery by 4,693 for 10 sec. Gain an additional 689 Mastery if you are below 35% health.

description: A death-defying concoction made with Mama's secret recipe to numb your sense of self-preservation.

spells.description: Equip: Your gear cools with Woven Duskthread and gains 756 Versatility when over 80% health.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Drape of the Lamplighter

enchantments.display_string: Enchanted: Rune of the Fallen Crusader

spells.description:
Equip: Your damaging spells and abilities have the chance to ignite your target with Radiant Focus for 15 sec. 

After dealing up to 1.9 million damage to the target, the focused energies ignite you with Radiance, granting between 391 to 782 of your highest Secondary stat based on damage dealt for 15 sec.
